668090.name: Fantasy Grounds - Gaming #9: Monstrous Humanoids & Outsiders (Token Pack)
668090.description:
This product contains over 225 tokens in a base 70mm format (for Medium-sized) all converted and optimized for online gaming with software like Fantasy Ground. Produced by artist Claudio Pozas and Fiery Dragon Productions, these tokens are framed in a fiery border and can be resized for different map scales and/or software. The tokens are sorted and scaled into different size categories, and are convered to PNG files for optimal online use.
File Lists
Monstrous Humanoids
Outsiders
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by:
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
